ordersText.title: DREAD JUDGEMENT
ordersText.general: After you resolve a won combat while resolving this order, you may force your opponent to choose 1 routed unit before the retreat phase and destroy it. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: PURGING BANNERS
ordersText.general: When you reveal this order token, rally all of your units in the active system. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: SIGILS OF REVELATION
ordersText.general: When you reveal this order token, you may look at all order tokens of any stack. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: TERROR STRIKE
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike you may either spend 1 [D] to force your opponent to rout 1 unit, or 2 [D] to force your opponent to retreat 1 unit. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: INEVITABLE EXCAVATION
ordersText.general: During this orbital strike, gain 1 [D], and you may spend 1 [M] to gain an asset token from this world. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: TRIUMPHAL WITHDRAW
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* After you resolve an Advance Order, you may discard this card to collect an Inquisition objective token that is on a friendly world in the active system.

eventsText.title: PSIONIC WARFARE
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* When you reveal an order during Operations phase, you may discard this card, to choose your opponents order upgrade and turn it face down, making it unusable this round.

eventsText.title: CUTTHROATS FOR HIRE
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* At the end of reinforce step of combat, you may discard this card to force your opponent to either rout 1 of his units if you are attacking or to retreat 1 unit if you are defending.

eventsText.title: RADICALS AND PURITANS
eventsText.general: Either purchase 1 structure reducing its materiel cost by 1 or destroy 1 of your structures in any system to gain that structure's materiel cost increased by 1.

eventsText.title: ELYSIAN DROP TROOPS
eventsText.general: Place 1 free Stormtrooper on an uncontrolled world in a system containing at least 1 of your ships or 1 free Stormtrooper on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: MINISTORUM'S DOGMA
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 combat upgrade, reducing its materiel cost by 1 for each system with no enemy units

eventsText.title: TOTAL AUTHORITY
eventsText.general: Discard this card during the first turn of Planning Phase to place an additional order token. During this Planning Phase you will place five order tokens.

combatText.title: STRATEGIC EXCRUCIATION
combatText.unit: Any Unrouted Unit: Your opponent cannot resolve the general ability of his next revealed combat card.

combatText.title: SHADOW ASSIGNMENT
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: If you have more [M] than your opponent, your opponent either routs 1 of his units or loses a die of your choice.

combatText.title: PSYKER SHIELD
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: Spend 2 (S) to gain 1 free reinforcement token in this area.

combatText.title: UNQUESTIONABLE WISDOM
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Play 1 combat card from your hand. Do not resolve it's abilities, but gain it's combat icons until the end of this execution round.

combatText.title: FRENZON IMPLANTS
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Spend 2 (B) to convert all of your [M] into [B].

combatText.title: SANCTIONED PSYKER
combatText.general: Your opponent may spend 1 [B] to gain 1 (B). If he does not, force your opponent to lose 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: If your opponent has any (B) gain 2 (S). Otherwise gain 1 [B].

combatText.title: CRUSADERS DEFENSE
combatText.general: Gain either 2 (B) or rally 1 of your units.
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: Your oponent may allow you to gain 1 [S], if he does not, gain 3 (S).

combatText.title: INCONCEIVABLE CUSTOMISATION
combatText.general: Gain either 2 (S) or spend 1 [M] to force your opponent to rout 1 of his units.
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: Your oponent may allow you to gain 1 [B], if he does not, gain 3 (B).

combatText.title: FAITH GUIDANCE
combatText.general: If you are attacking, your opponent cannot resolve the unit ability of his next revealed combat card. *newpara* If you are defending, retreat 1 of your units.

combatText.title: THE LIDLESS STARE
combatText.general: Force your opponent to reroll 2 dice. For each rolled [B] gain 1 (B) and 1 (S), for each [S]  rolled 1 (B).
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/ Black Ship: Force your opponent to lose either 1 [B] or 1 [S] unless he routs 1 of his units.

combatText.title: DEFENSIVE BARRAGE
combatText.general: You reroll either 1 [B] or 1 [M] to force opponent to lose 1 [B].
combatText.unit: Valkyrie/Black Ship: Take 1 Stormtrooper from any world and place it on this world.

combatText.title: HELLSTRIKE MISSILES
combatText.general: You reroll either 1 [S] or 1 [M] to force opponent to lose 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Valkyrie/Black Ship: Destroy 1 of your opponent's routed units.

combatText.title: TRUESILVER ARMOUR
combatText.unit: Grey Knight/Black Ship: During this combat health value of your units is increased by 1.

combatText.title: TELEPORT STRIKE
combatText.general: Choose 1 of your opponent's units. That unit  suffer damage first during this execution round.
combatText.unit: Grey Knight/Black Ship: During this execution round, if your opponent has to assign any damage, he assigns 3 additional damage.
